building.buildingcontents: University College covers three sites: University College (main central site), University College Sports Ground and an annexe.
Merton College covers three sites: Merton College, Holywell Buildings and Merton Sports Ground
Jesus College covers three sites: Jesus College (main central site), Ship Street Centre and and 2 annexes.
The college is located at the southern end of Woodstock Road, with Little Clarendon Street to the south and Walton Street to the west.
Located on High Street and Queen's Lane in central Oxford
Disability Advisory Service, Counselling Service, Peer Support, and Oxford University Assessment Centre.
